name: Zotefoams Evazote Winter Sleeping Pad - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: A durable and resilient foam pad, 1.5 centimetres thick for extra warmth. Physically blown with pure nitrogen gas for durability, Evazote® pads also have a high 18 percent EVA content, making them very resilient. Flexible to –70 degrees Celsius, it’s also abrasion and UV resistant.Dimensions are 150 x 50cm, with a 1.5cm thickness.
